title: Dragon Tattoo Trilogy: Extended Edition
synopsis: This gripping trilogy starts with an investigation into a 40-year-old cold case and ends with a court case involving murder and government conspiracy.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
synopsis: A journalist and a computer hacker team up to probe the unsolved disappearance of a wealthy man's niece, only to uncover the family's darkest secrets.

title: Let the Right One In
synopsis: A 12-year-old victim of bullies in a town plagued by murders spends his time plotting revenge -- until he meets a misfit vampire who steals his heart.
countries: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: The Girl Who Played with Fire
synopsis: Tech expert Lisbeth becomes the prime suspect when two journalists die after a magazine publisher launches an exposé of the Swedish sex trade.

title: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest
synopsis: This thriller follows feisty computer hacker Lisbeth Salander as she finds herself hospitalized, suspected of murder and targeted for death.

title: The Bridge
synopsis: When a body is found on the bridge between Denmark and Sweden, a Danish inspector and a Swedish detective must work together to find the killer.

title: The Ritual
synopsis: Four friends with a long-standing -- but strained -- connection take a hiking trip into the Swedish wilderness, from which they may never return.

title: Force Majeure
synopsis: A sudden avalanche at an Alpine ski resort shatters the serenity of a vacationing Swedish family when the father flees without his wife and children.

title: A Man Called Ove
synopsis: A misanthrope rules his condo's resident association with a grouchy iron fist, until new arrivals to the neighborhood slowly melt his frosty exterior.

title: The 100-Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out of the Window and Disappeared
synopsis: Allan Karlsson escapes from his nursing home on his 100th birthday and embarks on a hilarious adventure peppered with glimpses into his colorful past.

title: Arn: The Knight Templar
synopsis: This adventure saga follows Swedish son of nobility Arn Magnusson from his monastic education to his return to the family to help fight for the crown.
countries: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: Easy Money
synopsis: Three criminals' lives collide as they try to make it big, with a deadly chain of events initiated by an escaped crook battling the Serbian mob.

title: A Pigeon Sat on a Branch Reflecting on Existence
synopsis: On an unsuccessful business trip selling gag gifts, a pair of salesmen are the center of absurdist stories and running jokes about human existence.

title: Sound of Noise
synopsis: In this absurdist comedy, only a tone-deaf cop can stop six renegade percussionists who use their surroundings as instruments to create sonic chaos.

title: Slim Susie
synopsis: A Stockholm urbanite returns to his hometown to locate his missing beauty-queen sister, only to find that she's nothing like the girl he left behind.

title: Kiss Me
synopsis: When Mia attends her estranged father's engagement party and meets her soon-to-be stepsister, sparks fly and Mia unexpectedly falls in love.

title: Hamilton: In the Interest of the Nation
synopsis: After Swedish special agent Carl Hamilton infiltrates a mob smuggling weapons to terrorists, he finds his murderous training hard to leave behind.

title: Easy Money: Hard to Kill
synopsis: While serving time, business student-turned-coke smuggler JW plans to go straight when he gets out, but his past refuses to go away.

title: Millennium
synopsis: This miniseries created for Swedish television adapts the complete Millennium trilogy from Stieg Larsson's best-selling novels.

title: Maria Larssons eviga ögonblick
synopsis: In the early 1900s, a young working-class woman wins a camera in a lottery, giving her a lens through which to view the social change around her.

title: Easy Money: Life Deluxe
synopsis: JW now lives in exile and is more determined than ever to find out what happened to his missing sister Camilla. Every trace leads him to the world of organized crime in Stockholm.

title: Hip hip hora
synopsis: After drinking too much at a party and passing out, a 13-year-old girl tries to mend her reputation when compromising photos of her turn up at school.

title: Shed No Tears
synopsis: As a young man attempts to overcome stage fright and enter the world of music, he finds himself growing close to a beautiful admirer.

title: The Wedding Photographer
synopsis: When he loses his factory job, amateur shutterbug Robin becomes a wedding photographer, and his first job, an upper-class wedding, changes his life.

title: Once Upon a Time in Phuket
synopsis: Bored with life in Sweden, aspiring novelist Sven travels to Thailand, where two very different women inspire and challenge him in unexpected ways.

title: Till det som ar vackert
synopsis: Inspired by classical music, a young woman from the slums lies her way into a job at a concert hall. But trying to build a new life isn't easy.

title: Ego
synopsis: After losing his sight in an accident, vain, selfish Sebastian falls into despair until personal assistant Mia arrives to challenge his worldview.

title: God Save the King
synopsis: In 1984, a young woman leaves her provincial small town for the big city, where she strives to make her dreams of punk-rock stardom come true.

title: Behind Blue Skies
synopsis: After taking up a summer job at a restaurant, young Martin finds himself working for the manager on some outside projects -- which are not legal.

title: Agent Hamilton: But Not If It Concerns Your Daughter
synopsis: Secret agent Carl Hamilton springs into action to rescue his kidnapped goddaughter, Nathalie, from the clutches of ruthless terrorists.

title: Midnight Sun
synopsis: The bizarre murder of a Frenchman in northernmost Sweden lead French and Swedish investigators inside a twisted world of ritualistic murders.

title: Johan Falk
synopsis: An ambitious young homicide detective takes on killers, organized crime, weapons dealers, jewel thieves, terrorists, scoundrels and spies

title: Modus
synopsis: In snowy Sweden, a talented ex-FBI profiler works with the police and her own autistic daughter to unravel the strange motives of a vicious killer.

title: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared
synopsis: In need of money, an eccentric ex-spy and his younger octogenarian partner embark on an international quest for a valuable Soviet soda formula.

title: Storm
synopsis: A journalist is handed a box which could contain the answers of human existence. Soon, he finds himself framed for murder and fleeing assassins.

title: Nobel's Last Will
synopsis: After witnessing a murder take place at the annual Nobel Ball, a crime reporter finds herself at the center of international intrigue.

title: The Crown Jewels
synopsis: When she's arrested for attempting to murder the son of a factory owner, Fragancia spins a tale of love and betrayal that began in her youth.

title: Jonssonligan och den svarta diamanten
synopsis: In this installment of the crime caper franchise, Vanheden, Dynamite-Harry and a befuddled doctor scheme to pilfer the Romanov family's black diamond.

title: Morgan Pålsson: Världsreporter
synopsis: Sent by his boss to a tiny North African nation, a bumbling but loyal television reporter somehow uncovers a terrorist plot to steal plutonium.

title: Cockpit
synopsis: Unemployed pilot Valle impersonates his sister to land a job as a female flight captain, but professional and romantic complications soon arise.

title: The Master Plan
synopsis: A master thief enlists a crew of co-conspirators in an elaborate plan of revenge. To pull it off, they'll need perfect timing and even better luck.

title: Wither
synopsis: A group of friends trek to a deserted farmhouse for a party-filled weekend, but the house holds a very dark secret that could be the death of them.

title: Becoming Zlatan
synopsis: Using rare footage, this sports documentary follows iconic soccer star Zlatan Ibrahimović through his rocky early years and his 2005 breakthrough.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the

title: Froken Sverige
synopsis: Young factory worker Moa struggles to fit in with her pretentious family and friends but secretly yearns for the self-confidence to just be herself.

title: I taket lyser stjarnorna
synopsis: Unable to cope with adolescence and caring for her ailing mother, a struggling teen becomes rebellious -- prompted by her friendship with a classmate.

title: Solstorm
synopsis: After learning that her childhood friend is suspected of murdering her own brother, a successful lawyer returns to her hometown to find the truth.

title: Mig äger ingen
synopsis: Abandoned by her mother, a young girl in 1970s Sweden develops a complicated relationship with her rebellious, alcoholic, working-class father.

title: Jonssonligans storsta kupp
synopsis: When two gangsters try to bust their boss out of prison, they get a guy who knows all about printing money. Unfortunately, it's for the wrong country.

title: Sandor/Ida
synopsis: Two teens, a lonely virgin stuck in Göteborg and a party girl in Stockholm, form an unlikely friendship and learn about individuality and belonging.

title: Jönssonligan spelar högt
synopsis: Veteran crooks try living the straight life, but when they take a job guarding the opera, it becomes a high-stakes contest with the Sicilian mob.

title: Arne Dahl
synopsis: The elite, seven-member team of 'A Unit' is tasked with solving the most complex crimes in Sweden, from murder and drug trafficking to espionage.

title: The Anderssons in Greece
synopsis: A penny-pinching dad springs for an all-inclusive Greek vacation with his wife and three kids, who get up to plenty of antics of their own.

title: The Swimsuit Issue
synopsis: Sweden's only all-male synchronized swim team -- a group of passionate yet woefully incompetent middle-aged men -- pursues the world championship.

title: The Ape
synopsis: After he mysteriously wakes up one morning on a bathroom floor, a Swedish driving instructor moves through a day that grows more desperately surreal.

title: 30 Degrees in February
synopsis: This drama series follows a group of Swedes who've emigrated from their native country to Thailand in search of happiness and a better life.

title: Micke and Veronica
synopsis: A well-to-do physician and a Stockholm carpenter have obvious chemistry, but family drama festers and tests their love during a stay in Bohuslän.

title: Blue Eyes
synopsis: When she returns to her former job as chief of staff to Sweden's Minister of Justice, Elin Hammar unknowingly enters a vast, murderous conspiracy.

title: Nice People
synopsis: Somalian immigrants pick up the hockey-like sport of bandy in their adopted home of Sweden while facing prejudice from some longtime residents.

title: Asa-Nisse - Walkom to Knohult
synopsis: When a man inadvertently makes a water pump so powerful it finds oil instead, he declares his village an independent nation to protect his find.

title: Tommy
synopsis: The steely wife of exiled robber Tommy returns to Stockholm to collect her husband's cut and confront an associate who is moving in on Tommy's turf.

title: Bonus Family
synopsis: A new couple, their exes and their children navigate the emotional challenges and tricky logistics of blended family life in this Swedish dramedy.

title: Four More Years
synopsis: When David loses the prime minister election but meets charming state secretary Martin, he must navigate a newfound sexuality and a political divide.

title: Echoes from the Dead
synopsis: An aching mother visits her estranged father, whom she still blames for her young son's disappearance, and finds a clue in the decades-old mystery.

title: Bröderna Karlsson
synopsis: After meeting for the first time following their mother's death, the very different Karlsson twins experience a series of enlightening mix-ups.

title: Bitchkram
synopsis: When she misses her flight across the Atlantic, a teen hired to write about life in New York City fakes her articles while hiding in the countryside.

title: Someone You Love
synopsis: While on a visit home to Denmark, a self-absorbed musician reconnects with his grown-up daughter and is introduced to the grandson he has never met.

title: Ciao Bella
synopsis: 16-year-old Mustafa decides that an upcoming trip to Sweden will provide the perfect opportunity to pose as a mysterious Italian boy to attract women.

title: Tjockare än vatten
synopsis: An aging innkeeper's will requires her estranged children to run the family business together for a year before they can collect their inheritance.

title: Sune på bilsemester
synopsis: An eccentric family takes a Tyrolean road trip to the hometown of a famous artist, hoping he will sign one of his paintings and make them rich.

title: Trust Me
synopsis: The plot thickens at an amateur theater in Stockholm where everybody seems to be playing different characters on and off stage.

title: Bast i Sverige
synopsis: Teenager Marcello is bullied at school and pressured at home by his father, who wants him to be a soccer player, but all Marcello wants to do is fly.

title: Here Is Harold
synopsis: A furniture shop owner's business and life fall apart after an Ikea store opens in his town, inspiring him to vengefully kidnap the company's founder.

title: All About My Bush
synopsis: A sexually frustrated couple moves to a beautiful suburb where they discover that lust sprouts in the local gardens as well as flowers.

title: Fjallbackamorden
synopsis: In a beautiful resort town, crime novelist Erica Falck feels compelled to join her husband, a police detective, in investigating a string of murders.

title: Blondie
synopsis: Three troubled sisters return home for their mother's birthday celebration. But their problems are made worse when they are in each other's company.

title: 10 000 Timmar
synopsis: When he wins the lottery, an ordinary guy quits his job to pursue his dream of becoming a pro soccer player by devoting 10,000 hours to training.

title: The Boy with the Golden Pants
synopsis: When a good-natured boy finds a pair of magical pants that produces a bottomless supply of cash, he soon finds himself being pursued by villains.

title: Medicinen
synopsis: When her husband leaves her for a younger woman, a cash-strapped reporter volunteers to be a pharmaceutical test subject, with unexpected results.

title: The Last Sentence
synopsis: As the Nazis near the Swedish border, journalist Torgny Segerstedt defies his nation's complacency and speaks out against the growing menace.

title: Sensoria
synopsis: A woman in her late thirties who has lost everything moves into an old apartment only to find that it already has an occupant.

title: För kärleken
synopsis: The lives of five people are intertwined until a lifechanging moment occurs in this touching drama.

title: Sune i fjällen
synopsis: When Sune learns that Sophie is planning to ski with the irritatingly attractive Santos, he tries to intervene by hitting the slopes with his family.

title: Den man alskar
synopsis: After being brutally abused by Hannes, Lena begins a new life with Alf, a kind man. But her world is upended again when Hannes is released from jail.

title: Tillbaka till Bromma
synopsis: The same actor plays three different characters in this mockumentary about a trio of schoolmates who become subjects in a long-term film project.

title: The Maria Lang Collection
synopsis: An ordinary couple works with a detective to investigate a holiday murder, an old man's poisoning, a bride-to-be's disappearance and other mysteries.

title: Så vit som en snö
synopsis: This riveting drama chronicles the life of Elsa Andersson, who defies her father in a quest to realize her dream of becoming Sweden's first aviatrix.

title: I Rymden Finns Inga Känslor
synopsis: A teenager with Asperger's syndrome tries to overcome his own relationship challenges to find a new girlfriend for his depressed brother.

title: Gentlemen and Gangsters
synopsis: Now on the run, a writer relates his previous year's escapades when he got sucked into the thrilling, sordid orbit of boxer and jazz man Henry Morgan.

title: For Better and Worse
synopsis: A bickering couple must pretend to be happy at their niece's wedding but as it turns out, they aren't the only ones feigning a celebratory mood.

title: Shoo bre
synopsis: Friends with different backgrounds and approaches to life see their futures spiral out of control after making bad choices before leaving high school.

title: Lycka till och ta hand om varandra
synopsis: Reclusive widower Alvar and prickly teen Miriam find renewed direction when they start using Alvar's beloved puppets to bring cheer to downcast souls.

title: Henrik Schyffert: The 90's - Ett försvarstal
synopsis: The comedian-singer takes his therapeutic stand-up show on the road to talk about the '90s and defend everything Gen-X never got around to doing.

title: Tjuvarnas jul: Trollkarlens dotter
synopsis: Feeling forgotten by her new family and their new baby, Charlie attends a traveling fair, where she meets a mysterious wizard full of strange secrets.

title: Moving Art
synopsis: Experience nature's art as filmmaker Louie Schwartzberg highlights the beauty that lurks in oceans, forests, deserts and flowers.

title: Fallet
synopsis: A Swedish detective and her timid British colleague's attempt to solve a gruesome murder case nets mixed results and miscommunication.
